title: 2.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a program for a balloon to burst when clicked. Add a balloon sprite and a burst balloon costume for it. You can draw or upload an image of a bursting balloon from your computer if you are unable to fi nd it in the library

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
